function onActivated() -- play sound local randomIndicator = math.random(1, 3) magicSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("MagicSound"..tostring(randomIndicator))
if magicSound == nil then return end magicSound:Play()
-- shrink code local bagSize = 2 for i = 1, 15 do bagSize = bagSize - .1 Tool.Handle.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(bagSize, bagSize, bagSize) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, -2*bagSize/5, bagSize/2) wait(.1) end
-- GOOD RANDOMIZATION CODE!! numLoops = math.random(0,math.floor(1000*time())) numLoops = numLoops - (math.floor(numLoops / 10000)*10000) for i = 1,numLoops do whichNum = math.random(1,#gears) end -- END OF GOOD RANDOMIZATION CODE!
print("Picked: ") print(whichNum) local root = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(gears[whichNum])
local instances = root:GetChildren() if #instances == 0 then root:Remove() return end
root = root:GetChildren() if #root == 1 then root = root[1] else return end print(root) root.Parent = Tool.Parent Tool:remove() end
function onEquipped()
-- 19259975 = loud hohoho -- 19260023 = soft hohoho -- 19358641 = jingle
magicSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("MagicSound1") if magicSound == nil then magicSound = Instance.new("Sound") magicSound.Parent = Tool.Handle magicSound.Volume = .5 magicSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=19358641" magicSound.Name = "MagicSound1" end
magicSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("MagicSound2") if magicSound == nil then magicSound = Instance.new("Sound") magicSound.Parent = Tool.Handle magicSound.Volume = 1 magicSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=19259975" magicSound.Name = "MagicSound2" end
magicSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("MagicSound3") if magicSound == nil then magicSound = Instance.new("Sound") magicSound.Parent = Tool.Handle magicSound.Volume = 1 magicSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=19260023" magicSound.Name = "MagicSound3" end
end
